p: The EAC MRH initiative is already tracking time from application receipt to approval, or total assessment time [ 3]. By continuing to define target timelines for key milestones in the joint assessment process, developing formal processes for routinely monitoring relevant metrics, and making the resulting data public [ 21], the EAC MRH initiative can increase its efficiency and promote trust among stakeholders. Establishing a framework in which timely, high-quality assessments are the norm will result in safe and effective medicines reaching the market sooner, while unsafe or ineffective medicines are promptly denied approval.
